statements: ALTER TABLE artificial_intelligence ADD COLUMN creation_date DATE
ALTER TABLE neural_networks ADD COLUMN training_time INTEGER
ALTER TABLE neural_networks DROP COLUMN activation_function
ALTER TABLE ai_models ADD COLUMN last_updated TIMESTAMP
ALTER TABLE ai_datasets ADD COLUMN owner STRING
ALTER TABLE ai_models DROP COLUMN algorithm
ALTER TABLE AI_models ADD COLUMN model_description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE AI_datasets ADD COLUMN dataset_description TEXT;
ALTER TABLE AI_users ADD COLUMN user_status VARCHAR(10);
ALTER TABLE AI_Users ADD COLUMN role VARCHAR(100)
ALTER TABLE AI_Products ADD COLUMN price DECIMAL(10, 2)
ALTER TABLE AI_Research DROP COLUMN researcher
ALTER TABLE ai_research_papers ADD COLUMN journal_name VARCHAR(255);
ALTER TABLE ai_projects MODIFY COLUMN project_name VARCHAR(100);
ALTER TABLE ai_datasets DROP COLUMN size_mb;
